GoalAssignment.name: GoalAssignment
GoalAssignment.description: Represents the goals that are part of a care plan.

CompletionDate.description: The date when the goal is completed.

CompletionPercentage.description: Records the progress of the goal with a percentage value.

CustomGoalName.description: A custom name that can be defined for the goal assignment. If this field is empty, the goal definition name is used for the goal assignment.

GoalAssigneeId.description: The person to whom the goal is assigned.

GoalDefinitionId.description: References the goal definition in the PGI library that defines the details of the goal.

DescriptionCodeId.description: The system-defined code that represents the description of a standardized goal.

GoalType.description: Specifies the type of the goal.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the goal assignment record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of this goal assignment record.

ParentRecordId.description: The parent record that the goal is associated with.

Priority.description: Specifies the priority of the goal.

StartDate.description: The date when the goal is intended to start.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the goal.

TargetCompletionDate.description: The date when the goal is targeted to be completed.

AssignedById.description: References the person who assigned the goal.

ExtlGoalDefIdentifier.description: The ID of the goal in an external source system.

IsContinuousGoal.description: Indicates whether the goal is a continuous goal (true) or not (false). For instance, setting a goal to quit smoking.

ProgressionStatus.description: Specifies the progression status of the goal.

SortOrder.description: Determines the spot of the goal in the list of all goals in a care plan.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The identifier of the record in its source system.

SourceSystemModifiedDateTime.description: The date on which this item was last changed on the source system.

SourceSystemName.description: The name of the system this record came from.

StartEventCodeId.description: The system-defined code that represents the event that initiates progression towards the goal.

StatusDate.description: Records the date and time when the current status was set.

StatusReason.description: Describes the reason for the current status.

TaskJobStatus.description: This field is not used in Integrated Care Management.

TaskJobStatusMessage.description: This field is not used in Integrated Care Management.

GoalAssignment.accessRules: In Health Cloud, this object is available in API version 57.0 and later.
